inabayan! mungesalra ta!: pabulasi ku driya kanu didinsiya maw?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?
大家好！我們開始了。: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa! amawna, parebeliyasu kanku an daman.
Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: maaudalr lra! adri ku kemasu dra kalipang. pabulasi ku dra kalipang maw?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?
大家好！我們開始了。: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: maumau saya ku kalipang. mukasaya ta mikalipan maw!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!
大家好！我們開始了。: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: idri na tilin amau nu pinabulas kanku a daman. parebeliyasaw kanu.
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.
大家好！我們開始了。: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: an maranger yu driya menau dra druma dra tilin i, rengayu ku.
You can tell me what else you want to read.
大家好！我們開始了。: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: parebelaliyas ku kanu dra paisu an asuwa?
When do I have to pay you back?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: driyama lra! kiangeru lra an mipaisu yu.
It's okay, you can talk about it when you have money.
大家好！我們開始了。: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: parebelaliyas yu kanku dra paisu an asuwa?
When are you going to pay me back?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ti parebeliyasay yu an daman.
I'll return it to you tomorrow.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: parebelaliyas yu an asuwa kanku tilin?
When are you going to return my book?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ku parebeliyasay yu lra a daman maku?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?
大家好！我們開始了。: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: idri na tratruri tu pinabulas kanu kan Uratr maku?
Did Uratr lend you this pen?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa! ku kinibulas a uninan kantaw.
Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: idri na tratruri nu kinibulas kan Alaw maku?
Did you borrow this pen from Alaw?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: amelri! tu trinima kan ina.
No, this is what mom bought.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: uniyan lra dra ateri. uwa kibulas kan Senten dra saima dra ateri.
We are out of salt, let's go borrow some salt from Senten.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa! kayku kibulasa.
Okay, I'll borrow it.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: parebeliyasu ku paisu kayu i Aden.
Go tell Aden to give me my money back.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: mikiyan kanu dra munuma paisu?
How much does she owe you?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: auka yu isuwa?
Where are you going?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: auka ku i bakabak semalema dra kulang.
I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: makakuda yu?
What are you doing?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: tralutralun aw merarabi ku dra tralun. a puwaenayan lra an garemay.
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.
大家好！我們開始了。: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: alakan ku driya dra kawkaw aw dra pitaw maw?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?
大家好！我們開始了。: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nu retraanay isuwa?
Where did you put it?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: niretra i saninin kana kangkang.
Put it next to the plow rake.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nu kangkangaw lra na dare?
Have you ploughed the soil?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ku kangkangaw lra na dare a garemay. a puwabinian lra an garemay.
I've just ploughed the soil, and I'm going to sow the seeds.
大家好！我們開始了。: 我剛犁過土，等等要播種。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nu sinaleman na kulang i, kararuwayan lra kiyakulang?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?
大家好！我們開始了。: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: na buaw kadrini i, karuwa lra kiyabuawan. na kadumu kadriyu i, adri driya karuwa kikadumu.
The beans here are ready for harvesting, but the corn there is not yet ready.
大家好！我們開始了。: 這裡的樹豆可以收成了，那裡的玉米就還不能收成。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: iuwa dra sadru nu kinerutran na bunga.
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.
大家好！我們開始了。: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: pulrangi ku benekelr i kubaw maw?
Can you help me stack the barn?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: makakuda mu?
What are you doing?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: temababukulr mi dra kuraw.
We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: sadru a kuraw kadrini?
Are there many fish here?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: sadru lra a kuraw i buebu.
The fish traps are already full of fish.
大家好！我們開始了。: 魚簍裡已經有很多魚了。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kemuda yu dar kikuraw?
How do you usually catch fish?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ku panaaw dra kutang na kuraw.
I shoot fish with a spear.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: mipapana yu dar muka paalrupa?
Do you hunt with a bow and arrow?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: mipetrir ku dar muka penetrira. an numa i, mikuwang ku aw pilrangaw na suwan paalrup.
I usually catch my prey with steel clips, but occasionally I'll hunt with a gun and a dog.
大家好！我們開始了。: 我通常都是用鐡夾抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: tu dalan kana babuy idrini.
This is the road the boar took.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: daw malradram yu?
How do you know?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: tu dinapalran dra babuy idrini. driyama amau tu kinalrangan dra babuy.
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.
大家好！我們開始了。: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kayta melikapa drata petrir. kamawan dra mitiyu lra.
Let's go check our iron clips, it looks like we've caught our prey.
大家好！我們開始了。: 快去看我們的鐡夾，好像抓到獵物了。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: daw malradram yu?
How do you know?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kamawan dra tremaulr dratu bali na suwan. kamelamu ta kurenangay.
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.
大家好！我們開始了。: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: semasanga yu dra manay?
What are you working on?
大家好！我們開始了。: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: a sinanga dra batulrayaw idri na petrir. a papetriran dra kulabaw.
This is a clip made of steel and iron, used to catch mice.
大家好！我們開始了。: 這是鋼鐡做的夾子，用來抓老鼠的。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: amanay nu niretraan kadriyu?
What is that thing you put there?
大家好！我們開始了。: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: idri i, amau na petrir na sawawail dra dapalr. a dradrimutran dra ura.
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.
大家好！我們開始了。: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: semangalan dra tu iyaberay dra temuwamuwan. salaw kalruba ta pinaalrupan garem.
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.
大家好！我們開始了。: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa! ta kasuwaw muruma i drekalr aw marepaninia ta!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!
大家好！我們開始了。: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: an uninan i, palaladam ku kanemu dra kemudakuda ta temarapuyuma marengay kana “garamgaman”.
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in puyuma language today.
大家好！我們開始了。: 今天老師要教大家動物的卑南語怎麼說。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: an uninan i, palaladam ku kanemu dra kemudakuda ta temarapuyuma marengay kana “semaseberan”.
大家好！我們開始了。: 今天老師要教大家植物的卑南語怎麼說。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: an uninan i, palaladam ku kanemu dra kemudakuda ta temarapuyuma marengay kana “kalimudan”.
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in puyuma language today.
大家好！我們開始了。: 今天老師要教大家水果的卑南語怎麼說。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: adri kallallupe!
Don’t sleep.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: sameng!
Shut up!

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: adri aekan dra manay driya!
Don’t eat.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: pupatraranu nu tilin!
Take out your textbook.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: pupatraranu nu tratruri!
Take out your pen.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: pupatraranu nu tatilillan!
Take out your homework.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: apetru na tilin!
Put your textbook away.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: apetru na tratruri!
Put your pen away.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: apetru na aekanan!
Put your food away.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: apetru na kalalinayan!
Put your toy away.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nantaw kan manay idri na tratruri?
Whose pen is it?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: amau nanku.
It’s mine.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nantaw kan manay idri na tilin?
Whose textbook is it?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nantaw kan Bingki.
It’s Bingki’s.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nantaw kan manay idri na iyasaus?
Whose eraser is it?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: maulid ku.
I don’t know.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nantu kiping kan Kamayti idru?
Is that Kamayti’s clothes?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: amelli. nantu patratreell kan Panay.
No, this is Panay’s coat.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: sinsi, adri ku kemasu dra tilin.
Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ukasa kanu risarisan i saninin menau!
Share the book with your classmate next to you.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: mutrikel lla ku tratruri.
My pencil is broken.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: piyuēncepi temilill.
Write with a ball pen.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: uniyan lla ku iyasaus.
My eraser is missing.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ti pabulasay yu kananku iyasaus.
I will lend you my eraser.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: talaulep ta lla temakesi. taranapaw i dalan an muwaruma mu.
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.
大家好！我們開始了。: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心！

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa. sinsi, semangalan!
Got it, thank you teacher.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: talaulep ta lla temakesi. marepanauwa ta driya!
The class is over, goodbye everyone.
大家好！我們開始了。: 我們要下課了，大家再見！

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: sinsi, marepanauwa ta driya!
Goodbye teacher.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: inabayan! i Semalaw ku ngalad.
Hello everyone, my name is Semalaw.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: Semalaw, inabayan!
inabayan! i Tugi ku ngalad.
Hello everyone, my name is Tugi.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: Tugi, inabayan!
Hello, Tugi.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: inabayan! i Semalaw ku.
Hello, I am Semalaw.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: Semalaw, inabayan! i Giwat ku.
Hello, Semalaw, I am Giwat.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: inabayan! i Sulikang ku.
Hello, I am Sulikang.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: Sulikang, inabayan! i Giwat ku.
Hello, Sulikang, I am Giwat.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay yu?
Who are you?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i tinataw ku kan Ising. i Tiwa ku.
I am Ising’s mom, Tiwa.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay yu?
Who are you?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: tu wadi ku kan Ising. i Kimmay ku ngalad.
I am Ising’s sister. My name is Kimmay.
大家好！我們開始了。: 我是Ising的妹妹，我的名字是Kimmay。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay taytaw?
Who is he?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nanku sinsi taytaw. i Hulun tu ngalad.
He is my teacher, Hulun.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay idriyu na trau?
Who is that person?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i baelli na mainayan. i Kisaw tu ngalad.
He is my brother, Kisaw.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i Semalaw taytaw?
Is he Semalaw?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa, i Semalaw taytaw.
Yes, he is Semalaw.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i Semalaw yu?
Are you Semalaw?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: amelli. i Giwat ku.
No, I am Giwat.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay i Semalaw?
Who is Semalaw?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i Semalaw ku.
I am Semalaw.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay i Giwat?
Who is Giwat?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i alielli i Giwat.
Giwat is my friend.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay tu ngalan kan bau na babayan?
What is your elder sister’s name?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i Apeng tu ngalan kan baelli na babayan.
My elder sister’s name is Apeng.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay tu ngalan kanu wadi na babayan?
What is your younger sister’s name?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i Pipis tu ngalan kanku wadi na babayan.
My younger sister’s name is Pipis.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: malladram yu kantu ngalad?
Do you know his name?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i Semalaw tu ngalad.
He is called Semalaw.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: munuma tu ami kan bau na mainayan garem?
How old is your elder brother?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: muketrep miasma dra lruwatra tu ami garem.
He is fifteen years old.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: munuma lla tu ami kanu wadi na mainayan garem?
How old is your younger brother?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kallalluwatr lla tu ami garem.
He is five years old.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ullaya a takesian kanemu drekall?
Do you have schools in your community?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ullaya.
Yes.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: temakesi yu kanemu drekall na takesian?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?
大家好！我們開始了。: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎？

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa, an kadru mi i takesian temakesi i, kamawan mi dra sarumaenan.
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.
大家好！我們開始了。: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay idriyu na mainayan?
Who is that man?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i namalli na maranak.
i manay idriyu na babayan?
Who is that woman?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i baelli na babayan.
She is my sister.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i manay idriyu na wallak?
Who is that kid?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: ku wadi na mainayan.
He is my younger brother.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kiyakarun dra manay i taina?
What does your mother do?
大家好！我們開始了。: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作？

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: a hitay i nanalli.
She is a soldier.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kiyakarun dra manay i temama?
What does your father do?
大家好！我們開始了。: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作？

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: a sinsi i namalli.
He is a teacher.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: nu wadi na mainayan taytaw?
Is he your younger brother?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: amelli, tu alialian kanku wadi na mainayan taytaw.
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.
大家好！我們開始了。: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: i bau na babayan taytaw?
Is she your elder sister?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: amelli, ku wadi na babayan taytaw.
No, she is my younger sister.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: miyasama nadru na sarumaenan?
How many people in their family?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: miyalluwatr nadru na sarumaenan.
There are five people in their family.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: miyasama a wallak kanemu?
How many children in your family?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: miyapat a wallak kaniyam.
There are four children in our family.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: miyasama nu wadi?
How many younger siblings do you have?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: uniyan ku dra wadi dra mainayan. ullaya a miyatelu ku wadi na babayan.
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.
大家好！我們開始了。: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: miyasama na bau?
How many older siblings do you have?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: uniyan ku dra baebaan.
I don’t have any older siblings.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: miyasama nu wawadiyan?
How many siblings do you have?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: uniyan ku dra wawadiyan.
I don’t have any siblings.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: a maluwadi mu?
Are you brothers?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa, i baelli na mainayan taytaw.
Yes, he is my brother.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: a Yuēn-cu-min mu?
Are you aboriginals?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa, a Yuēn-cu-min mi.
Yes, we are aboriginals.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: a Pinuyumayan taytaw?
Is she Pinuyumayan too?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa, a Pinuyumayan taytaw.
Yes, she is Pinuyumayan too.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kemudakuda na wari garem?
How’s the weather today?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: parullitek na wari garem. treketrekel dra bias dra enay.
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.
大家好！我們開始了。: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kemudakuda na wari garem?
How’s the weather today?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: parubias na wari garem. treketrekel dra enay.
It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kemudakuda na wari i patraran?
How’s the weather outside?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: panana na kadaw. adri kaabalu penadang kana patatalaan dra kadaw.
The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kemudakuda na wari i patraran?
How’s the weather outside?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kemutrekutrem. adri kemadaw.
There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kuwadakuda na wari an daman?
How is the weather tomorrow?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: adri kakadaw an daman. kakutrem aw kapakakireb a bali.
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.
大家好！我們開始了。: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kuwadakuda na wari an adrunu?
How was the weather that day?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: parullitek kandri na wari. pikiruwan dra patratreell an uwapatraran yu.
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.
大家好！我們開始了。: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kemudakuda na wari a kasedean?
How’s the weather on the weekend?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: inaba na wari a kasedean.
It will be sunny on the weekend.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kaaudall na wari an adru?
Will it be rainy that day?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kainanaba na wari an adru. adri kaaudall.
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.
大家好！我們開始了。: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: kaaudall na wari an adru?
Will it be rainy that day?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: aiwa, kaaudall na wari an adru.
Yes, it will be rainy that day.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: maaudall garem?
Is it raining now?

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: madranga lla na udall. mupatraran lla na kadaw.
The rain stops and the sun comes out.

inabayan! mungesalra ta!: maaudall garem?
Is it raining now?
